comments.body: This is added recently by another PR.
Does it just affect master? OK in any event if it fixes a test.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +261,265 @@    // To avoid allocating any resources immediately after releasing the resource from the task to
    // make sure that `availableAddrs` below won't change
    when(ts.resourceOffers(any[IndexedSeq[WorkerOffer]], any[Boolean])).thenReturn(Seq.empty)
    backend.driverEndpoint.send(
      StatusUpdate("1", 1, TaskState.FINISHED, buffer, taskResources))
